title: Al Batin FC
text:
Al-Batin Football Club () is a Saudi Arabian professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Hafar%20Al-Batin">Hafar Al-Batin</a>, <a href="Eastern%20Province%2C%20Saudi%20Arabia">Eastern Province</a>, that competes in the <a href="Saudi%20Professional%20League">Saudi Professional League</a>. The club was founded in 1979.
Al-Batin's colours are sky blue and black. At the end of the 2007–08 season, they won their first promotion to <a href="Saudi%20Second%20Division">Saudi Second Division</a>. On 25 March 2011, Al-Batin won their first promotion to Saudi First Division. They play their home matches at the <a href="Al-Batin%20Club%20Stadium">Al-Batin Club Stadium</a>.
